meta.title: Get AI Estimate - Aviniti
meta.description: Describe your app idea and get an instant AI-powered Project Blueprint with cost breakdown, timeline, and recommendations

hero_description: Describe your idea in plain language and our AI will generate a detailed Project Blueprint with cost breakdown, timeline, and recommendations.

hero.title: Get Your AI-Powered Project Estimate
hero.subtitle: Describe your idea and get an instant Project Blueprint

step1.title: What type of project do you want to build?
step1.description: Select the platform that best describes your project

project_type.web_desc: Website, online platform, or admin panel
project_type.ai_ml_desc: Smart features powered by artificial intelligence
project_type.cloud_desc: Server setup that grows with your business

step2.title: Tell us about your project idea
step2.description: Describe what you want to build in your own words. No technical knowledge needed.
step2.label: Your Idea
step2.placeholder: Example: I want to build a food delivery app where restaurants can list their menus, customers can browse and order food, and delivery drivers can pick up and deliver orders...
step2.hint: Be as detailed as you'd like — our AI will ask follow-up questions
step2.example_1: I want an app for my gym where members can book classes and track workouts
step2.example_2: A marketplace where people can rent out their apartments like Airbnb
step2.example_3: An office management system to handle attendance, tasks, and payroll

step3.title: A few quick questions to refine your estimate
step3.description: Answer YES or NO to help us understand exactly what you need.

step4.title: Where should we send your Project Blueprint?
step4.description: We'll email you the full report with a downloadable PDF.
step4.review_description: We've identified the essential features for your project. You can also add optional enhancements to get a more comprehensive estimate.

form.whatsapp_label: Also send my Project Blueprint via WhatsApp
form.privacy_text: By submitting, you agree to our
form.privacy_suffix: . We will never share your information.

analyzing.description: Our AI is reading your idea and preparing smart follow-up questions

generating_features.description: Generating must-have and enhancement features based on your answers

results.title: Project Blueprint Ready
results.subtitle: Based on the information you provided
results.approach_custom_desc: Built from scratch to match your exact requirements
results.approach_ready_made_desc: We have a pre-built solution that matches your needs
results.approach_hybrid_desc: Start with a ready-made solution and customize it
results.next_step_1: Review your detailed Project Blueprint PDF

consultation.heading: Ready to Bring This to Life?
consultation.subtitle: Let's discuss your {projectName} project and turn this blueprint into reality.

cross_sell.roi: Your {projectName} estimate is ${cost}. See when you'll earn it back.
cross_sell.analyzer: Want to validate {projectName} before building? Get an AI-powered viability analysis.

errors.describe_idea: Please describe your idea in at least 10 characters
errors.select_features: Please select at least one feature
errors.email_required: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.phone_required: Phone number must be at least 10 digits
errors.generation_failed: Failed to generate estimate. Please try again or contact us directly.
errors.analyze_failed: Failed to analyze your idea. Please try again.
errors.features_failed: Failed to generate features. Please try again.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
